description: [``botocore``] This release extends the GetReservationPurchaseRecommendation API to support recommendations for Amazon MemoryDB reservations.
[``botocore``] AWS CodeBuild now supports AWS Lambda compute.
[``botocore``] Added new API that allows Amazon Connect Outbound Campaigns to create contacts in Amazon Connect when ingesting your dial requests.

[``botocore``] Update the input of CreateDBInstance and ModifyDBInstance to support setting CA Certificates. Update the output of DescribeDBInstance and DescribeDBEngineVersions to show current and supported CA certificates.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for Apache Airflow version 2.7.2. This version release includes support for deferrable operators and triggers.
[``botocore``] Amazon Polly adds new US English voices - Danielle and Gregory. Danielle and Gregory are available as Neural voices only.
[``botocore``] Add partitional endpoints for iso-e and iso-f.
[``botocore``] Update endpoint-rules client to latest version
